name: Login to the application with invalid credentials

testSteps.description: 1: Login to the application with invalid credentials ({Email=sandeep@e-zest.in})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
When User click on login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Given User is on sign in page
When User click on sign in button
Then Login error message is displayed to user

userStory.narrative: We will be using this feature file for Login functionality validations in SMT application mentioning all possible scenarios.

title: Login to the application with invalid credentials
backgroundTitle: User navigate to sign in page of SMT application

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User is on sign in page
And User enter email "<Email>"
And User enter password
When User click on sign in button
Then Login error message is displayed to user
